Ice and Lunarpine set down a short distance from Grizzlotrons location.
Lunarpine scans the area with his DNA scanner and smells the ground with his
advanced sense of smell. Ice transformed to her owl mode and perched at the
top of a nearby tree. "It's been a while since the last time we were here
hasn't it?" she thinks remembering finding Lunarpine for the first time.

Lunarpine heard her thoughts and chuckled, "Seems strange how we've changed
so much but this place hasn't." he remembered it like it was yesterday even
though it had been a year. This was one of the few places that hadn't been
disturbed by thier senseless war.

Ice flew low and aproached the cave, "I'm senseing something, he's in here."
she says landing near a mine.

"Ice get back" The wolfbot warned to late as the first mine exploded sending
her through the air to come crashing down at his feet. Lunarpine transformed
to his half wolf mode and sniffed the ground, "Theres more traps where that
came from, it seems that whoever we're tailing is expecting company."

Ice again transformed to her mutant robot form. A scanner rose from her
wrist. "I'm getting Grizzly DNA, but it doesn't seem to match Rex. If the
bot knows us we don't know it." She'd learned her lesson, Lunarpines senses
were best suited for this neighborhood so she'd let him lead.

"See if you can contact him telepathically" the half wolf says as he tries
to plan a way through the mines.

Ice opened her mind trying to locate Grizzltron, without him in her line of
sight it proved difficult but not impossible. "Can you hear me? You can come
out, we're friends." she calls to the newcomer, Even though the two meant no
harm they didn't know if the other bots intentions were the same.
----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars <beastwars@...>

Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 8:42 AM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron notices on the scanner equipment he pulled from the pod that
there was to bots coming nearer to his postion.  He place to Remote Mines
under a rock near the entrance of the cave.  He then walked deeper in the
cave as he pull out his gernade launcher.


OOC:I know I am taking all of his wepon from golden eye for 64. But I don't
care.
